title: Resume Matching with Job Descriptions Using FAISS and Sentence Embeddings
documentationURL: please input job description (required_skills,Years_of_Experience), resumes (name, technical skills, years of experience)
author: Rakhi Sharma
description: This Python script leverages FAISS and SentenceTransformer to match resumes against a job description based on similarity scores. It generates embeddings for both resumes and the job description, indexes them using FAISS, and retrieves the most relevant resumes by calculating Euclidean distance between their embeddings. The results are exported in JSON or CSV format, displaying names and similarity scores for easy analysis. The script is modular, allowing for flexible input and model configurations.
